plot: Betty Boop and Bimbo run away from home, but that night they are scared by a chorus of ghosts singing the title song.
title: Minnie the Moocher
plot_es: Betty Boop and Bimbo run away from home, but that night they are scared by a chorus of ghosts singing the title song.
plot_en: Betty Boop and Bimbo run away from home, but that night they are scared by a chorus of ghosts singing the title song.

cast.name: Cab Calloway and His Cotton Club Orchestra
